title: Pereira (Father Joaquim Placido)
body: Born in the parish of Seixal on December 10, 1885, and ordained as a priest in 1909. He has served in various parishes of the diocese. In addition to his collaboration in some newspapers, he published the book entitled 'Nossa Senhora do Monte, Padroeira da Ilha da Madeira' in Lisbon.

Seixal: Birthplace of Father Joaquim Placido Pereira

1885: Birth of Father Joaquim Placido Pereira
